column4: How would i install Ubuntu with a BTRFS root? i can do it in Fedora but i am curious, i have tried it in Ubuntu but i got an error about intrid.img
How would i install Ubuntu with a BTRFS root? i can do it in Fedora but i am curious, i have tried it in Ubuntu but i got an error about intrid.img
How would i install Ubuntu with a BTRFS root? i can do it in Fedora but if i try it in Ubuntu i get an error upon boot up about intrid.img, any help?
I don't think the current stable version of Ubuntu supports btrfs roots. Ubuntu Maverick does, but it hasn't been released yet.
